thread.title: Skype suffers outage
thread.title_full: Skype suffers outage - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Skype suffers outage
text:
NEW DELHI: Skype, Microsoft's online telephone and video service, said that some users are unable to make calls because their settings show that they and their contacts are offline, even when they are logged in. 

Affected users are unable to change their status, but they can use instant messaging and Skype for web services, Skype said. 

"We're working on a fix for this issue and hope to have an update for you soon," Skype said in a blog post.
